fields.help:
Name of F5 VM need to be created. 
No special characters except (-) adn spaces are allowed

fields.values: Small - 1SLOT (2vCPUs / 4096M-RAM / 20GB disk), Medium - LTM/GTM (2vCPUs / 4096M-RAM / 50GB disk), Large - ALL(4vCPUs / 8192M-RAM / 140GB disk)

fields.help: Number of CPU Cores that are needed for the new VM
RAM Size for the new VM
Additional interface for adding VLAN etc...
Do you want to use BIG-IQ for licensing the new F5 VM?
Base Registration Key obtained for activating the license
Host Name of the device (should end with the zone info)
Name in which the device will be added in the AVX Inventory
ID to which the status will be sent

tasks.scriptContent:
try:
    import sys
    sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
    sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
    import paramiko
    import json
    import appviewx
    import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
    host_name = '<%host%>'
    host = '<%host_ip%>'
    user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(host_name)

    ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
    ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
    ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
    vm_name = '<%vm_name%>'
    use_flavour = str('<%use_flavours%>')
    mgmt_interface = '<%mgmt_interface%>'
    add_interface = '<%add_interface%>'
    
    if use_flavour == 'Yes':
        flavour = '<%flavour%>'
        if "Small" in flavour:
            cpu_cores = '2'
            ram_memory = '4096'
        elif "Medium" in flavour:
            cpu_cores = '2'
            ram_memory = '4096'
        elif "Large" in flavour:
            cpu_cores = '4'
            ram_memory = '8192'
    else:
        ram_memory = str(int('<%ram_size%>')*1024) #Convert from Giga Bytes to Mega Bytes
        cpu_cores = '<%cpu_cores%>'
    def get_add_interface_string(add_interface):
        if add_interface:
            final_string = ''
            add_interface_list = add_interface.split(',')
            for val in add_interface_list:
                final_string += '--network bridge={val},model=virtio '.format(val=val)
            return final_string
        else:
            return ''

    add_interface_string = get_add_interface_string(add_interface)

    cmd = 'virt-install --name {name} --ram {ram} --import --disk path=/opt/vm/{name}/BIGIP-12.1.2.0.0.249.qcow2,bus=virtio,format=qcow2 --vcpus {cpu_cores} --os-type linux \
    --network bridge={mgmt_interface},model=virtio \
    {add_interface} --vnc --console pty,target_type=serial'.format(name=vm_name,ram=ram_memory,cpu_cores=cpu_cores,\
    mgmt_interface=mgmt_interface,add_interface=add_interface_string)
    AVX::LOG(cmd)
    stdin_vm, stdout_vm, stderr_vm = ssh.exec_command(cmd)
    outJson = {"mgmt_interface":mgmt_interface}
    if (stdout_vm.channel.recv_exit_status() == 0):
        AVX::LOG("Creation of Virtual Machine Completed Successfully")
        AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)

    else:
        AVX::LOG("Disk and VM Creation Failed"+str(stderr_vm.read().decode()))
        AVX::OUTPUT(outJson,2)
    ssh.close()
except Exception as e:
    AVX::LOG(e)

notificationMessage.0: Determining the MAC Address of VM
notificationMessage.2: Unable to identify the MAC of VM

metaData.taskHeader: KVM Get MAC Information of the VM

tasks.task_name: KVM Get MAC Information of the VM
tasks.scriptContent:
mgmt_interface = '<%mgmt_interface%>'

def pairs(iterable):
    i = iter(iterable)
    while True:
        yield next(i), next(i)


def get_interface_details(ssh,name):

    stdin,stdout,stderr = ssh.exec_command("virsh dumpxml "+str(name)+" | grep 'source bridge\|mac address' | awk '{print $2}'")
    tmp = stdout.read().decode()
    tmp_output = ''.join(val for val in tmp if (val.isalnum() or val =='=' or val == ' ' or val == '\n' or val == ":"))
    tmp_output = tmp_output.split('\n')
    tmp_final_output  =[mac+','+bridge for mac, bridge in pairs(tmp_output)]
    maclist = {}

    for i in tmp_final_output:
            maclist[i.split(',')[1].split('=')[1]] = i.split(',')[0].split('=')[1]

    #print(maclist)

    stdin1,stdout1,stderr1 = ssh.exec_command('brctl show')
    stdout1 = stdout1.read().decode()
    tmp1 = stdout1.split('\n')
    
    tmp_output1 = []
    for i in tmp1:
        if i.split('\t')[0] !='':
            if i.split('\t')[0][-2] !='v':
                 tmp_output1.append(i.split('\t')[0])
    output1 = tmp_output1[1:]
    #print(output1)
    stdin2,stdout2,stderr2 = ssh.exec_command("route -n")
    tmp2 = stdout2.read().decode()
    tmp_output2 = tmp2.split('\n')
    detail_list = []
    tmp_output2 = [x for x in tmp_output2 if x]
    tmp_output2 = tmp_output2[3:]
    for i in tmp_output2:
        detail_list.append([i.split()[0],i.split()[2],i.split()[7]])
    #print(detail_list)

    final_dict = {}
    for i in output1:
            for j in detail_list:
                    if i in j:
                        final_dict[str(i)]={'mac':maclist.get(str(''.join(e for e in i if e.isalnum()))),'subnet':j[0]+'/'+str(sum([bin(int(x)).count("1") for x in j[1].split(".")]))}
    return final_dict,maclist

try:
    import sys
    sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
    sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
    import paramiko
    import json
    import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
    
    host_name = '<%host%>'
    host = '<%host_ip%>'
    user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(host_name)
    name = '<%vm_name%>'
    ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
    ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
    ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
    #print(ssh)
    interface_detail_dict,mac_dict = get_interface_details(ssh,name)
    mgmt_interface = ''.join(e for e in mgmt_interface if e.isalnum())
    mac_address = mac_dict[mgmt_interface].upper()
    outJson = {"mac_addr":mac_address,'interface_dict':interface_detail_dict}

    if(len(mac_address) <=18):
        AVX::LOG("VM is running and the MAC Address is "+str(mac_address))
        AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)
        
    else:
        AVX::LOG("Stating the Getting the MAC Information Failed")
        AVX::OUTPUT(outJson,2)
        
    ssh.close()
except Exception as e:
    print(e)

notificationMessage.0: Checking the status of the VM
notificationMessage.2: VM is still not up. We will try 10 times before failing the request

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys
import time
sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
import paramiko
import json
import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt

host_name = '<%host%>'
host = '<%host_ip%>'
user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(host_name)

mac_addr = '<%mac_addr%>'


try:
    def get_ip():

        ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
        ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
        ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
        update_arp(ssh)
        arp_dict = {}
        stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command('arp -n')
        string_output = stdout.read().decode()
        splited_output = string_output.split("\n")[1:-1]
        for i in splited_output:
            arp_dict.update({i.split()[2]:i.split()[0]})
        ip = arp_dict.get(mac_addr.lower())
        return ip,stdout.channel.recv_exit_status()
        if not stdout.channel.recv_exit_status() == 0:
            sys.exit()
        ssh.close()
        
    def update_arp(ssh):
        intr_dict = <%KVMGetMACInformationoftheVM_1.output.interface_dict%>
        subnet = intr_dict.get('<%mgmt_interface%>').get('subnet').lower()
        command = "nmap -sP "+subnet+" | grep -B 2 "+mac_addr.lower()
        ssh.exec_command(command)
        time.sleep(10)
    
    def check_login():
        import socket
        
        ip,status = get_ip()
        if ip != None:
            s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
            outJson = {'final_ip':ip}
            
            try:
                s.connect((ip, 22))
                AVX::LOG("Status of the VM with IP {ip} is checked and the VM is UP and RUNNING".format(ip=ip))
                AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)
            except socket.error as e:
                AVX::LOG( "Status of the VM with IP {ip} is checked and the VM is still not UP".format(ip=ip))
                AVX::OUTPUT(outJson,2)
            s.close()
        else:
            AVX::LOG( "VM is still not UP or Management IP is still not assigned to it")
            AVX::OUTPUT({},2)
except Exception as e:
    AVX::LOG(str(e))
if __name__ == "__main__":
    check_login()

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys
import paramiko
ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
import json
import os
import time
import traceback
import base64
import urllib.request, urllib.parse, urllib.error
import urllib.request, urllib.error, urllib.parse
import getpass
import subprocess
#import pycontrol.pycontrol as pc
from suds.client import Client
#from get_ip import get_ip
#from Decrypt import getpassword

def connect_remote(host,user,password):
    try:
        ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
        ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22,timeout=120)
        return ssh
    except Exception as e:
        print((str(e)))

def get_dossier_key(ssh,host,password, license):
    cmd_for_dossier_key = "get_dossier -b " + license
    #ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
    #ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22,timeout=60)
    a, b, c = ssh.exec_command(cmd_for_dossier_key)
    return(b.read().strip())

def get_license_from_F5_License_Server(dossier_string):
    reg_keys = []
    license_string = ""
    eula_string = ""
    server_hostname = "activate.f5.com"
    email  = "<%email%>"
    firstName = "<%first_name%>"
    lastName = "<%last_name%>"
    companyName = "<%company_name%>"
    phone = "<%phone%>"
    jobTitle = "<%job_title%>"
    address = "<%address%>"
    city = "<%city%>"
    stateProvince = "<%state%>"
    postalCode = "<%postal_code%>"
    country = "<%country%>"
    try: 
        #import pdb;pdb.set_trace()
        license_string = ""
        download_url = "https://" + server_hostname + "/license/services/urn:com.f5.license.v5b.ActivationService?wsdl"
        #print(download_url)
        local_wsdl_file_name = str(server_hostname) + '-f5wsdl-w-https.xml'
        #print(local_wsdl_file_name)
        wsdl_data = []
        try: 
            with open(local_wsdl_file_name, 'r') as fh_wsdl:
                wsdl_data = fh_wsdl.read()
        except Exception as e:
            pass
            
        if not wsdl_data:
            f5wsdl = urllib.request.urlopen(download_url) 
            newlines = []
            for line in f5wsdl:
                newlines.append(line.decode().replace('http://' + server_hostname , 'https://' + server_hostname))
            fh_local = open(local_wsdl_file_name,'w')
            fh_local.writelines(newlines) 
            fh_local.close()
        url = "file:" + urllib.request.pathname2url(os.getcwd()) + "/" +  local_wsdl_file_name
        #print(url)
        client = Client(url)
        transaction = client.factory.create('ns0:LicenseTransaction')
        transaction = client.service.getLicense(    
                                                dossier = dossier_string,
                                                eula = eula_string, 
                                                email = email, 
                                                firstName = firstName , 
                                                lastName = lastName, 
                                                companyName = companyName, 
                                                phone = phone, 
                                                jobTitle = jobTitle, 
                                                address = address, 
                                                city = city, 
                                                stateProvince = stateProvince, 
                                                postalCode = postalCode, 
                                                country = country
                                                )
        eula_string = transaction.eula
        if transaction.state == "EULA_REQUIRED":
            transaction = client.service.getLicense(    
                                                        dossier = dossier_string,
                                                        eula = eula_string, 
                                                        email = email, 
                                                        firstName = firstName , 
                                                        lastName = lastName, 
                                                        companyName = companyName, 
                                                        phone = phone, 
                                                        jobTitle = jobTitle, 
                                                        address = address, 
                                                        city = city, 
                                                        stateProvince = stateProvince, 
                                                        postalCode = postalCode, 
                                                        country = country,
                                                        )
        if transaction.state == "LICENSE_RETURNED":
            license_string = transaction.license
        else: 
            license_string = "License server returned error: Number:" + str(transaction.fault.faultNumber) + " Text: " + str(transaction.fault.faultText)
        return license_string
    except Exception as e:
        raise
def backup_old_license(ssh,host,username,password):
    #ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
    stdin,stdout,stderr = ssh.exec_command('mv /config/bigip.license /config/bigip_old.licence')


def apply_license(ssh,host, final_key,user,password):

    #ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22,timeout=60)
    transport = paramiko.Transport((host, 22))
    #print(transport)
    transport.connect(username = user, password = password)
    sftp = paramiko.SFTPClient.from_transport(transport)
    sftp.put("/var/tmp/bigip.license","/config/bigip.license")
    transport.close()
    a,b,c = ssh.exec_command('reloadlic')
    subprocess.getstatusoutput("mv /var/tmp/bigip.license /var/tmp/<%host_name%>_bigip.license")
    
if __name__ == '__main__':
    user='root'
    paswd='default'
    
    IP = '<%final_ip%>'

    license_key = '<%bskey%>'
    
    #user, paswd = getpassword(host)
    ssh=connect_remote(IP, user, paswd)
    #ssh = client.SSHClient(IP,'22')
    #ssh.login(user,paswd)
    mode = 'Internet'
    dossier_key = get_dossier_key(ssh,IP,paswd,license_key).decode()
    final_key = get_license_from_F5_License_Server(dossier_key)
    with open('/var/tmp/bigip.license','w+') as lic_file:
        lic_file.write(final_key)
    
    comm_message = 'Unable to communicate with the Activation Server!'
    #print json.dumps({'error': comm_message})
    if final_key == None:
        sys.exit(comm_message)
    if "Error" in final_key:
        message =str(final_key.split(':')[-1].strip())
        AVX::LOG("Device Licensing Failed. Error: "+message)
        AVX::OUTPUT(final_key,2)
        
        ssh.close()
    else:
        backup_old_license(ssh,IP,user,paswd)
        apply_license(ssh,IP,final_key,user,paswd)
        ssh.close()
    
        outJson = {"IP": IP,'bskey': license_key}
        AVX::LOG("Activation Successfull ::: Device Licensed with the base key {bskey} and the license file is moved to the device".format(bskey = license_key))
        AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys import json import subprocess sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES) sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER) import paramiko import time import appviewx import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt from Infoblox_vw import Infoblox as infoblox from base64 import b64encode null = None vm_name = '<%vm_name%>' host_name = '<%host_name%>' admin_password = '<%admin_password%>' admin_password_enc = b64encode(bytes(admin_password,"ascii")) admin_password_enc = admin_password_enc.decode() time_zone = '<%time_zone%>' use_flavour = '<%use_flavours%>' host = '<%final_ip%>' intr_dict = <%interface_dict%> vlan_name = '<%vlan_name%>' vlan_intr = '<%add_interface%>' mgmt_intr = '<%mgmt_interface%>' tmp = intr_dict.get(vlan_intr).get('mac').lower() infoblox_device = '<%infoblox_device%>' ntp_server = '<%ntp_server%>' dns_server = '<%dns_server%>' is_ldap = '<%configure_ldap%>' is_snmp = '<%configure_snmp%>' user = 'root' password = 'default' if use_flavour == 'Yes': flavour = '<%flavour%>' if "Small" in flavour: prov_modules = 'LTM' elif "Medium" in flavour: prov_modules = 'LTM,GTM' elif "Large" in flavour: prov_modules = 'LTM,GTM,AFM,ASM' else: prov_modules = '<%provisioning_modules%>' conn = appviewx.db_connection() #function to get the commands def get_commands(ssh): (stdin, stdout, stderr) = \ ssh.exec_command('tmsh show net interface all-properties') stdout = stdout.read().decode() tmp_out = stdout.split('\n')[6:] tmp_out = [x for x in tmp_out if x] macdict = {} for val in tmp_out: macdict[val.split()[2]] = val.split()[0] subnet = intr_dict.get(vlan_intr).get('subnet')#fetch the subnet free_ip = get_ip(subnet) subnet_mask = subnet.split('/')[1]#get the mask #print(free_ip) mgmt_subnet = intr_dict.get(mgmt_intr).get('subnet') tmp_mgmt_gateway = mgmt_subnet.split('/')[0].split('.') tmp_mgmt_gateway[-1] = '254' mgmt_route = '.'.join(tmp_mgmt_gateway) # res_output = reserve_free_ip(host_name, free_ip) # print(res_output) cmd = [] #cmd.append('tmsh create cli transaction') #modify the host name cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys global-settings hostname '+ str(host_name)) #modify the admin password cmd.append('tmsh modify auth user admin password ' + str(admin_password)) cmd.append('tmsh modify auth user admin shell tmsh') cmd.append('tmsh modify auth user admin shell bash') module_string = '' #making the provisioning modules names into a single string prov_modules_list = prov_modules.split(',') for val in prov_modules_list: module_string += str(val).lower() + ' ' #Provision the requested module with nominal memory cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys provision ' + module_string+ 'level nominal') #change the timezone cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys ntp timezone ' + str(time_zone)) #making the gui initial setup disabled cmd.append('tmsh modify sys global-settings gui-setup disabled') vlan = macdict.get(str(tmp)) #print vlan #print tmp #creating the net vlan cmd.append('tmsh create net vlan ' + str(vlan_name).lower()+ ' interfaces add { ' + "1.1" + ' { untagged } }') #assigning the self ip cmd.append('tmsh create net self ' + str(free_ip)+' vlan ' + vlan_name + ' address ' + str(free_ip) + '/'+str(subnet_mask)) #adding default route try: if ntp_server != None or ntp_server not in ["null","",None,"None","Select"]: ntp_server_ip = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':ntp_server},{'ip':1})['ip'] cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys ntp servers add { '+ntp_server_ip+' }') if dns_server not in ["null","",None,"None","Select"]: dns_server_ip = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':dns_server},{'ip':1})['ip'] cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys dns name-servers add { '+dns_server_ip+' }') except: pass if is_snmp == 'Yes': snmp_server_ip = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':"<%snmp_server%>"},{'ip':1})['ip'] cmd.append('tmsh modify /sys snmp traps add { <%snmp_trap_name%> { version 1 community <%snmp_community%> host '+snmp_server_ip+' port <%snmp_port%> network mgmt }}') if is_ldap == 'Yes': ldap_server_ip = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':"<%ldap_server%>"},{'ip':1})['ip'] cmd.append('tmsh modify /auth ldap system-auth servers add { '+ldap_server_ip+' } port <%ldap_port%> bind-dn <%ldap_domain%> bind-pw <%ldap_password%>') #saving the configuration #cmd.append('submit cli transaction') cmd.append('tmsh create net route default 0.0.0.0/0') cmd.append('tmsh create /sys management-route default gateway '+mgmt_route) cmd.append('tmsh save sys config') #cmd.append('quit') # for i in cmd: # print(i) return cmd,free_ip def get_ip(subnet): free_ip = infoblox.get_free_ip(infoblox_device,subnet) infoblox.reserve_free_ip(infoblox_device,host_name,free_ip) return free_ip #function to execute the commands def execute_command(): ssh = paramiko.SSHClient() ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy()) ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22) commands,free_ip = get_commands(ssh) # print(commands) for cmd in commands: # print(cmd) ssh.exec_command(cmd) time.sleep(3) # print(b.channel.recv_exit_status()) AVX::LOG(cmd) ssh.close() return free_ip,commands if __name__ == '__main__': ip,cmd=execute_command() prov_module_mail = prov_modules.split(",") if use_flavour == 'Yes': flavour = '<%flavour%>' if "Small" in flavour: prov_modules = ["LTM"] else: prov_modules = ["LTM","GTM"] else: prov_modules = '<%provisioning_modules%>' prov_modules = prov_modules.split(",") for i in prov_modules: if i == "ASM" or i == "AFM": prov_modules.remove(i) outJson = {'ip':ip,'prov_modules_mail':prov_module_mail,'commands':'
'.join(cmd),'admin_password_enc':admin_password_enc,"prov_modules":prov_modules} AVX::LOG("Device has been provisioned with the information given as the input") AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys
import paramiko
import json
import time
import os
sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
import appviewx
import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt

host_name = '<%host%>'
conn = appviewx.db_connection()
host = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':host_name},{'ip':1})['ip']
user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(host_name)
dict_name = '<%vm_name%>'
ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
ssh.exec_command('mkdir /opt/vm/'+str(dict_name))
time.sleep(2)
ssh.exec_command('cp BIGIP-12.1.2.0.0.249.qcow2 /opt/vm/'+str(dict_name))
time.sleep(60)
ssh.close()
outJson={'host':host}
AVX::LOG('F5 Image Copied Successfully')
AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys
sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
import subprocess
import json
import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
import appviewx
from base64 import b64encode
big_iq_device = '<%big_iq_device%>'
conn = appviewx.db_connection()
host = conn.appviewx.device.find_one({'name':big_iq_device},{'ip':1})['ip']
user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(big_iq_device)
enc_data = b64encode(bytes(user,"ascii")+b':'+bytes(password,"ascii"))
auth_data = enc_data.decode()
curlCommand = 'curl -k1 -u '+user+':'+password+' -X GET https://'+str(host)+'/mgmt/cm/device/licensing/pool/regkey/licenses'
process = subprocess.Popen(curlCommand, stdout=subprocess.PIPE,shell=True)
(stdoutdata_name, stderrdata_name) = process.communicate()
stdoutdata_name = json.loads(stdoutdata_name.decode("utf-8"))
#print(stdoutdata_name)
items_list = stdoutdata_name.get('items')
id_name_dict = {}
for val in items_list:
    id_name_dict[val.get('name')]=val.get('id')

#print(id_name_dict)
pool_name = '<%reg_key_pool%>'
reg_key_pool = id_name_dict.get(pool_name)
curlCommand_1 = 'curl -k1 -u '+user+':'+password+' -X GET https://'+str(host)+'/mgmt/cm/device/licensing/pool/regkey/licenses/'+str(reg_key_pool)+'/offerings'
process = subprocess.Popen(curlCommand_1, stdout=subprocess.PIPE,shell=True)
(stdoutdata_pool, stderrdata_pool) = process.communicate()
stdoutdata_pool = json.loads(stdoutdata_pool.decode("utf-8"))
#print(stdoutdata_pool)

items_list_1 = stdoutdata_pool.get('items')
reg_key_list = []
for val in items_list_1:
    reg_key_list.append(val.get('regKey'))
#print(reg_key_list)
assigned_list=[]
free_list=[]
for val in reg_key_list:
    curlCommand_3 = 'curl -k1 -u '+user+':'+password+' -X GET https://'+str(host)+'/mgmt/cm/device/licensing/pool/regkey/licenses/'+str(reg_key_pool)+'/offerings/'+str(val)+'/members/'
    process = subprocess.Popen(curlCommand_3, stdout=subprocess.PIPE,shell=True)
    (stdoutdata_status, stderrdata_status) = process.communicate()
    stdoutdata_status = json.loads(stdoutdata_status.decode("utf-8"))
    items_list_2 = stdoutdata_status.get('items')
    if not items_list_2:
        free_list.append(val)
    else:
        assigned_list.append(val)
reg_key = free_list[0]
outJson={'reg_key':reg_key,'pool_id':reg_key_pool,'host':host,'user':user,'password':password,'auth_data':auth_data}
AVX::LOG('Information Gathered for Licensing VM with BIG-IQ')
AVX::OUTPUT(outJson)

notificationMessage.0: Waiting for device to be added in BIG-IQ Inventory

notificationMessage.0: Please wait while the VM gets destroyed

tasks.scriptContent:
try:
    import sys
    sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
    sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
    import paramiko
    import json
    import appviewx
    import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
    host_name = '<%host%>'
    host = '<%host_ip%>'
    user,password = Decrypt.getpassword(host_name)

    ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
    ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
    ssh.connect(host,username = user,password = password,port = 22)
    vm_name = '<%vm_name%>'
    commands = []
    commands.append('virsh shutdown {name}'.format(name=vm_name))
    commands.append('virsh destroy {name}'.format(name=vm_name))
    commands.append('virsh undefine {name}'.format(name=vm_name))
    commands.append('virsh destroy {name}'.format(name=vm_name))
    for cmd in commands:
        stdin_vm, stdout_vm, stderr_vm = ssh.exec_command(cmd)
    ssh.close()
    AVX::LOG("VM Destroyed Successfully")
    AVX::OUTPUT({})
except Exception as e:
    AVX::LOG(e)
    AVX::OUTPUT({},2)

notificationMessage.1: Successfully cleaned up IP and other things

tasks.scriptContent:
import sys
import json
sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)
import appviewx
import Decrypt_Python3 as Decrypt
from Infoblox_vw import Infoblox as infoblox
import requests
requests.packages.urllib3.disable_warnings()
null = None

iq = "<%big_iq%>"
if iq == "Yes":
    url = "https://<%host_iq%>/mgmt/cm/device/licensing/pool/regkey/licenses/<%pool_id%>/offerings/<%reg_key%>/members/<%id_dev%>"
    headers = {"Authorization":"Basic <%auth_data%>","Content-Type":"application/json"}
    requests.delete(url,headers=headers,data=json.dumps({}),verify = False)
    url_device_remove = "https://<%host_iq%>/mgmt/shared/resolver/device-groups/<%big_iq_dev_pool%>/devices/<%uuid%>"
    requests.delete(url_device_remove,headers=headers,data=json.dumps({}),verify = False)
    AVX::LOG(url)
    AVX::LOG(url_device_remove)
infoblox_device = '<%infoblox_device%>'
host_name = '<%host_name%>'
ip = "<%ip%>"
try:
    infoblox.unreserve_freeip(infoblox_device,ip,'associate')
except:
    pass
AVX::LOG("Unreserverd the ip in infoblox")
AVX::OUTPUT({})
